biotools.summary: The tool can be used to create custom matrices to describe transcription factor binding sites (TFBS), search for clusters of TFBS, and identify target genes. Free registration is required.

bioschemas.name: Target Explorer
bioschemas.summary: The tool can be used to create custom matrices to describe transcription factor binding sites (TFBS), search for clusters of TFBS, and identify target genes. Free registration is required.
